text: « This would have been considered to be the traditional unified modei 101 uie design of a software program. » Monolithic is referring to everything being contained in one system/piece. « Self contained, tightly coupled, usually single tier. » Usually a large codebase and can be difficult to maintain. » Layered approach, each layer depends on each other. « This is the default mode of coding. « Each layer will take care of a major responsibility/task.
